rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0001
rows.name: Damn...I knew we would have heard from them by now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0002
rows.name:
It was definitely fighting SOMETHING.
But this damage... It's not the usual claw or bite marks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0003
rows.name: No signs of the team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0004
rows.name:
If they were eaten, we'd know it.
So did they walk away, or were they taken?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0010
rows.name: Investigate

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest searching the area.

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0020
rows.name: Retreat

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest heading back to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Right. Either way, they couldn't have gotten very far.
Let's keep looking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0006
rows.name:
The job's not finished—
we have more questions now than when we started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0007
rows.name: We'll head back once we find some answers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0007_2
rows.name: Until then, we keep looking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0008
rows.name: Hold up, Elma—check this out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm picking up an Earth-based IFF signal
coming from that direction. It's Pathfinder![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0010
rows.name: That thing over there, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0011
rows.name: It doesn't look natural, does it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0012
rows.name: No, it doesn't. It looks like trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0013
rows.name:
And look at this—
I'm picking up readings for other lifeforms, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Multiple signals, moving around inside the structure.
Elma, you don't think...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0030
rows.name: Hypothesize

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest they must be intelligent lifeforms.

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0040
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0041
rows.name: Suggest indigens must have wandered inside.

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0015
rows.name: I think you're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0016
rows.name: No.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Look at their movements—they're controlled, orderly.
They're definitely not wild animals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0018
rows.name: Now the question is, are they native to Mira...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0019
rows.name: Or are they visitors, like us? And if so, from where?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0020
rows.name: You think it's one of the forces that destroyed Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Let's not jump to any conclusions.
It's a big universe out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0022
rows.name: Of course, we shouldn't rule it out, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0023
rows.name: Should we call this in to HQ?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Yes, but not from here. If we're picking up their signals,
they might be close enough to intercept ours...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0025
rows.name: You there! Drop your weapons![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0026
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0027
rows.name: Stay calm. We don't want to provoke them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0028
rows.name: Earth aliens?! Surrender. Now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0029
rows.name:
They know about Earth?!
You may have been right after all, Lin...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0050
rows.name: Stand Down

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0051
rows.name: Lower your guard and negotiate.

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0060
rows.name: Grip Weapon

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0061
rows.name: Prepare to attack.

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0030
rows.name: What are you doing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0031
rows.name: It's okay, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0031_2
rows.name:
Just stand down. I'm not sure why, but somehow,
they're able to communicate with us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0032
rows.name: Meaning...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0033
rows.name: Meaning we need to know if diplomacy is a viable option.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0034
rows.name: Roger that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0035
rows.name: Stand down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0036
rows.name:
Did you already forget my first lesson?
Fighting is a last resort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0037
rows.name: Our friends here appear to be able to speak our language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Which means, we need to find out
if diplomacy is a viable option.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0039
rows.name: You're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0040
rows.name: We come in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0040_2
rows.name:
And we're willing to negotiate. If you have any Earth alien
prisoners, we'd ask the conditions for their release.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0041
rows.name: If you don't...we'll leave you in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0042
rows.name:
No negotiations. No conditions.
We have our orders![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0043
rows.name: All Earth aliens must die![ST:wait ]
